Mike Harrigan.Action: Races toward a dangerous police line to take command during a violent drug lord standoff.
Leads as the ‘whip’ of Metro Command, showing responsibility and presence of mind.
Appears sweat-soaked and disheveled but continues forward, signaling dedication and sincerity.
No evidence of considerate or friendly interaction in this excerpt.
Emerges from the unmarked police car under fire, appearing as the field commander, commanding presence at dangerous scene.

Drives aggressively and recklessly, peeling out in reverse and causing property damage, showing disregard for surroundings.

Uses his vehicle aggressively and creatively by peeling out in reverse into a telephone pole to gain a tactical advantage.
